name: INSULA (ne_mene)
description:
HOW TO PLAY

- You have 3 floating islands to move on, when you kill every enemy you have to hit the big crystal with your orb. Hitting the crystal will make one island fall and make one island regenerate with enemies and potentially items! When you hit the crystal 10 times you win and get an epic cutscene!

CONTENT

- Randomly generated islands, 9 items, 2 cutscenes and an enemy!

MADE BY

- Programmer - ne_mene

- Sound designer and musician - Markositta

- Graphical artist - IAmHappy
